title: 1 over π\piπ and ϕ\phiϕ
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\lim_{m\to \infty^+}\lim_{n\to\infty^+}\prod_{k=1}^{m}\operatorname{\cos }\left(2\pi \sqrt[2^k]{ n^{2^k}+ \frac{n^{2^k-1}}{120}+ 2^k}\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" being positive integer and  the value of the above expression can  be expressed "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{a}{\phi\pi}\left(\frac{1}{{\sqrt b}}+\sqrt {\frac{c}{2}} -\frac{\phi}{\sqrt{2}}\left(\sqrt 3-1\right)\sqrt{1+\phi^2}\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive integers with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" being primes. Find the value  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b+c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Notation:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\phi=2^{-1}\left(1+\sqrt 5\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" denotes "},{"type":"text","text":"Golden ratio","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inspired by "},{"type":"text","text":"(1)","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" and 
"},{"type":"text","text":"(2)","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

title: 1 prime gives 2 primes
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p is a prime number that makes "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4p^{2} +1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6p^{2} +1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a prime number. \nfind sum of p as possible"}]}]}
